parameters.name: showtime
parameters.description: How long to show the stimulus, in ms

parameters.name: TargRadius
parameters.description: Size in pixels of target radius (roughly)

parameters.name: MinAngle
parameters.description: Smallest angle allowed in Attneave shape (degrees)

parameters.name: MaxAngle
parameters.description: Largest angle allowed in attneave shape (degrees)

parameters.name: MinLength
parameters.description: Length, in pixels, of shortest allowed edge

parameters.name: mincorners
parameters.description: Minimum number of corners in shapes

parameters.name: maxcorners
parameters.description: Maximum number of corners in shapes

parameters.name: shapepert
parameters.description: Max pixel distance of shape perturbation
